speaker: Godfrey Bloom,
english: Godfrey Bloom, on behalf of the IND/DEM Group . – Mr President, it is more money again, is it not? May I suggest that the people who think this network is a really good idea pay for it themselves, instead of squeezing ever more money out of the hard-pressed British taxpayer, who is already being squeezed dry by the greedy and stupid politicians who seem to hold sway over us at every level.
